description.value: Information about juristictional sone/subsone denoting the "tjenested" of the Person. Could be nested. The information about each sone must be included in a Bundle.

short.value: Information about juristictional sone/subsone denoting the "tjenested"

definition.value: Information about juristictional sone/subsone denoting the "tjenested" of the Person. Could be nested. The information about each sone must be included in a Bundle.

comment.value: Some systems have a nested system with Municipality, District, Sone and SubSone to denote the proper juristictional sone within the Municipality

definition.value:
VKP expects an UUID, but any uniqe identifier could be applied.
Unique code or number identifying the location to its users.
A UUID identifier is represented with system and value.

VKP expects "urn:ietf:rfc:3986" as system when UUID is used
Establishes the namespace for the value - that is, a URL that describes a set values that are unique.

VKP and FHIR expects UUID to have prefix "urn:uuid:"
The portion of the identifier typically relevant to the user and which is unique within the context of the system.

Type of juristictionaly sone denoted. There will always be a set of predefined types for each system or municipality. e.g. Municipality, District, Sone and subsone. Because no standardized way of denoting the sone/subsone exists only the text value denoting sone.type are used for VKP.

short.value: Text defining the type of juristictional sone

definition.value: Text defining the type of juristictional sone

For vkp-sone-Location this code is used to name a jurisdictional area within the country/municipality/area. A fixed value of jdn is used to indicate this.
Physical form of the location, e.g. building, room, vehicle, road.
Reference to another vkp-sone-Location this location is a part of e.g a District is a part of a Municipality
